attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Reform.Changes need to be made by the government in all sorts of areas,openness,honesty,the EU and so on and so forth.
Respect.We all need to respect each other,our beliefs,thoughts,ideas and our belongings.
 Responsibility.We all have a responsibility for our own actions.It has become far to easy in recent years to be able to blame someone else for our own mistakes or shortcomings.There has to be a huge decrease in the abuse of the "compensation culture".
Back to reform.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
